Interface CacheProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJndiBoundCacheProvider, EhCacheProvider, HashtableCacheProvider, NoCacheProvider, OSCacheProvider, SingletonEhCacheProvider, SwarmCacheProvider
Deprecated. As of 3.3; see for details. 

public interface CacheProvider

Support for pluggable caches.

Gavin King
